amendment.description: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund to reduce foreign assistance to Egypt and increase funding for an east coast missile defense shield.

vote.text: Amendment SA 471 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 25 - 74. Record Vote Number: 85.
